    @allure.story("Positive - Update user profile successfully")
    def test_patch_user_profile_positive(self, authenticated_api: ApiFacade):
        """
        Positive test:
        Verify that user profile can be successfully updated
        """
        payload = {
            "full_name": "test",
            "birthday": "2001-01-01",
            "region": 3
        }
    
        with allure.step("Send PATCH request to update profile"):
            response = authenticated_api.users.patch_profile(payload)
    
        with allure.step("Check status code 200 or 202"):
